title: Oura launches a proprietary AI model focused on women’s health
summary: The model supports questions spanning the full reproductive health spectrum, from early menstrual cycles through menopause.

title: Nimble raises $47M to give AI agents access to real-time web data
summary: Nimble uses AI agents to search the web, verify and validate the results, and then clean and structure the information into neat tables that can then be queried like a database.

title: Canva acquires startups working on animation and marketing
summary: With the new acquisitions, the company wants to bolster its position as a marketing solution by potentially adding video creation and more granular measurement.

summary: The viral X post from an AI security researcher reads like satire. But it's really a word of warning about what can go wrong when handing tasks to an AI agent.

summary: While some dual investors are understandable, others were more shocking, and signal the disregard of a longstanding ethical conflict-of-interest rule.

title: Anthropic accuses Chinese AI labs of mining Claude as US debates AI chip exports

summary: OpenAI is partnering with four consulting giants in an effort to see more adoption of its OpenAI Frontier AI agent platform.

summary: In his new book, A World Appears, Michael Pollan argues that artificial intelligence can do many things—it just can’t be a person.
